title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-1.7 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-1.7 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part, or its application to any
particular person or circumstances, is held invalid, the remainder of this

Part, and the application thereof to other persons or circumstances, shall not
be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-1.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
